column4: hi can some one help me  how to install https://edge.launchpad.net/~bhavi/+archive/mobile-daily/+packages  PPA to my ubuntu 10.4 I am jst two days old to ubuntu.....
but how do I get it working in my system please help PPA
If it's Ubuntu desktop; sudo add-apt-repository ppa:bhavi/mobile-daily
Or you can go to System -> Admin. -> Software Sources -> Third party, select add and paste in ppa:bhavi/mobile-daily
